name: Sneaker Craft!
description:
Build and paint awesome sneakers in the new game from the creators of Sneaker Art! Fun for sneakerheads, casual players, or anyone who wants to be creative!

+ BUILD your own sneakers! Drag parts onto your sneaker and create your own unique low and high top designs! There’s hundreds of combinations!
+ PAINT sneakers with easy to use paint controls and your choice of brushes, sprays or pencils! Each paint tool creates a different effect! Experiment and find your favorite!
+ LACE up your shoes! Chose the perfect lace for your design and follow the pattern to tie up your laces for bonus cash!
+ UNLOCK heaps of pre-made shoes including sneakers, slides and sports shoes!
+ REPAIR sneakers for customers! Clean them and restore the paint perfectly to satisfy your customers! Make sure they leave happy!
+ SELL your shoes in your huuuuge shop! Swipe to move around the shop, and place shoes wherever you want them to create the perfect organized shop! The better your designs, the more money you’ll make! Get rich from your awesome sneakers!
+ CUSTOMIZE the appearance of your shop and design space! There’s over 50 customization options, including walls, benches, signs and accessories!
+ SHARE your designs with your friends & tag #sneakercraft to get featured on our social media pages!


All this plus exclusive VIP sneakers to build and paint, daily gifts, new box designs, laces, paint patterns and so much more!!!
